The statements in this report include forward-looking statements within the meaning of the Private Securities Litigation Reform Act of 1995 . AMD’s cash, cash equivalents, and short-term investment balances together with the availability under that certain revolving credit facility (the Revolving Credit Agreement) are available to AMD and certain of its subsidiaries .
 AMD’s ability to obtain sufficient external financing on favorable terms, or at all . Management's current knowledge, the potential liability related to AMD's current litigation will not have a material adverse effect on its financial position, results of operation or cash flows . A small number of customers will continue to account for a substantial part of AMD's revenue and receivables .
